cause.description:
Prostitution is the act of offering one's body for sexual purposes in exchange for money. This group wants to see an end in the USA to paid-for photographic pornography and stripping.
1. Prostitution is the act of offering one's body for sexual purposes in exchange for money.
2. Prostitution should be universally illegal.
3. Stripping in exchange for money is prostitution.
4. Participating in pornographic media of a photographic sort in exchange for money is prostitution.
cause.mission: to promote the idea that such things as strip clubs photographic pornography should be made illegal
cause.name: End Pornography and Other Forms of Prostitution
